name: Eternal Flow
description:
In the game you have to drive a small boat and deliver a box with a musical record to your destination. But the stingrays living outside the spheres have other plans - they will try to stop you by firing projectiles of energy balls at you. The good news is there are supplies scattered along the way (arrows for your "Fishing Rod" and food that replenishes your health)

Made in one week for Game Jam "Джем от народа"
